content: Just landed in NYC with a tech-themed event brewing in my mind. A mix of Japanese aesthetics and innovation. Venue hunt begins now.
raw_content: Just landed back in NYC and already planning a tech-themed social event. The idea came to me mid-flight - a fusion of Japanese aesthetics and tech innovation. Challenge: finding a venue that's both inspiring and accessible. Surprise: My Japanese sketches might just become the event's decor! #NYC #TechMeetUp

content: Just turned 22 in NYC and had a birthday epiphany: blending my love for art with blockchain tech might be my niche. Had a wild meeting with an NFT artist who mistook my interest in their work for a love confession. Here's to a new chapter of creativity in tech!
raw_content: Just turned 22 in NYC and had a birthday epiphany: blending my love for art with blockchain tech might just be the niche I've been looking for. Had a wild meeting with an NFT artist who mistook my interest in their work for a love confession. Here's to a new chapter of creativity in tech! 🎨💡 #BirthdayRealization
